title: Import Configuration
description: Schema for bulk data import configurations in the data-combiner project

endpoint.description: The URL to download the bulk data file

headers.description: Headers to include in the download request

oneOf.description: Array of strings/HTTP requests for generating auth tokens

headers.description: Headers for the auth token request

body.description: Body for the auth token request

method.description: HTTP method for the auth token request

token_key.description: Key path to extract token from response (e.g., 'credentials.token')

separator.description: Delimiter for CSV/TSV files (defaults to ',' for CSV, '\t' for TSV)

has_header.description: Whether the file includes a header row

null_values.description: Strings to treat as null values

column_map.description: Maps database columns to file columns

oneOf.description: Direct mapping to a column name

type.description: The type of transformation to apply

unique_keys.description: Optional: Column names that determine record uniqueness for upsert operations. If a record with the same values for these columns exists, it will be updated rather than inserted. If not specified, all non-null columns in the record will be used.
